title: bool hasFinished = m_playerQuit || m_playerWon; m_finishedQueryLock.unlock(); return hasFinished

note: m_finishedQueryLock.lock(); m_playerQuit = true; m_finishedQueryLock.unlock(); void SetPlayerWon() m_finishedQueryLock.lock(); m_playerWon = true; m_finishedQueryLock.unlock(); bool GetPlayerWon() m_finishedQueryLock.lock(); bool playerWon = m_playerWon; m_finishedQueryLock.unlock(); return playerWon;
